Hello!

I'm a first-year undergraduate student studying Computer Engineering at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. I'm interested in high-frequency trading and the applications of math and computer science in finance. Outside of class, I enjoy weight-lifting, web-design, animation, and reading.

Check out my blog if you're interested in finance, math, or computer science. If not, you can play with some of the cool stuff I've made. And if you're here for cookies, I'm sorry to disappoint you - I haven't quite figured out how to teleport baked goods through the internet just yet.
